metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1921 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in avidemux element in gst_avi_demux_invert function which allows a heap overwrite while parsing avi files. Potential for arbitrary code execution through heap overwrite.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1921` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-gtk3 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1
gstreamer1.0-qt5 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20.3-0ubuntu1').
